hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Wednesday Yellow - Flower
hiveArticle.body:
My Motto is simple, whenever you encounter any beautiful flower just capture it. Why, because whenever you are low the beauties of these flowers will help you cheer up.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmStvFj5qjwTA7RFAKUhLz6ELEsieQQutVZqaav59bf6Dt/image.png)

### Camera : Nokia 6
